changeDefaults.nodeSummary: Change the settings used by nodes by default
changeDefaults.synthesizersOverwriteStrategyDescription: Do you want to change the default synthesizers?
changeDefaults.ttsLanguageOverwriteStrategyDescription: Do you want to change the default tts language?
changeDefaults.ttsBargeInOverwriteStrategyDescription: Do you want to overwrite the default bargeIn settings?

sendData.nodeSummary: Attach custom data to a dialog
sendData.inputDataDescription: Store custom data. This is an object that can have arbitrary properties. Each property is expected to have a string value.

forward.nodeSummary: Forward the call to a different destination

bridge.nodeSummary: Bridge the call to a different destination for agent assistance
bridge.inputHeadNumberDescription: The phone number prefix to bridge to
bridge.inputExtensionLengthDescription: The range of extensions to choose a number from

refer.nodeSummary: Transfer the call to a different destination using SIP REFER

multipleChoicePrompt.nodeLabel: Get Multiple Choice Answer from Caller
multipleChoicePrompt.nodeSummary: Say something to the call with a multiple choice prompt
multipleChoicePrompt.inputChoicesDescription: Add and adopt options and their synonyms to your need.

promptForNumber.nodeSummary: Say something to the call with a prompt to enter a number
promptForNumber.inputMaxDigitsDescription: The maximum amount of digits the number can have. If this property is set, input terminates once the limit has been reached.
promptForNumber.inputMinDigitsDescription: The minimum amount of digits that are required for this prompt to complete successfully. If this property is set, the prompt completes successfully if at least as many digits were entered.
promptForNumber.inputSubmitInputsDescription: One or more synonyms to end an number input, such as DTMF_#

play.nodeSummary: Play an audio file to the call
play.inputUrlLabelDescription: Location of audio file. Allowed formats: Linear PCM with signed 16 bits 8 kHz or 16 Hz, A-law or Âµ-law 8 kHz.
play.inputFallbackTextDescription: The fallback text is used when the audio playback did not succeed.

stopPlay.nodeSummary: Stops the audio playback started using the "Play Audio File" node
stopPlay.inputUrlLabelDescription: The URL must be exactly the one specified in the "Play Audio File" node.

recordingStart.nodeSummary: Start or resume recording of a call
recordingStart.inputMaxDurationDescription: After maximum recording duration (in seconds), the recording will be stopped automatically.

recordingStop.nodeSummary: Pause or terminate recording of a call
recordingStop.inputTerminateDescription: Whether the recording should be terminated, rather than just paused

shared.inputRecordingIdDescription: An arbitrary string to idetnify the the recording in case multiple recordings are created in the same dialog
shared.inputTextDescription: The message to introduce the prompt to the caller
shared.inputTimeoutDescription: The duration in seconds after which the prompt will be cancelled
shared.inputLanguageDescription: This allows to override the synthesizer language for specific messages
shared.inputSynthesizersDescription: If specified, this parameter overrides the synthesizer list from the project settings
shared.inputCallerIdDescription: The phone number displayed to the callee. (This is a best-effort option, correct display can not be guaranteed)
shared.inputCustomSipHeadersDescription: An object where each property is the name of a header, and the value is a list of strings. All header names must begin with X-.
shared.inputUserToUserDescription: A list of opaque strings that are send as User-To-User SIP headers.
shared.inputRingTimeoutDescription: The maximum time (in seconds) the call will be ringing before the attempt will be cancelled
shared.inputAcceptAnsweringMachinesDescription: Wether the bot should accept answering machines picking up.
shared.inputDataDescription: An object with key-value pairs to be attached as custom data to the dialog
shared.inputEndFlowDescription: Stop the flow after executing this node
shared.inputExperimentalEnableRingingToneDescri: Enables the playback of a ringing tone while the call is pending. This option will change in the future.
shared.inputWhisperingTextLabel: Whisperred Text to the transfered party
shared.inputWhisperingTextDescription: The text played out to the person the call is transfered to before both call parties will be joined
shared.inputDestinationDescription: The phone number to forward to (+E.164 format, e.g. +49721480848680)
shared.synthesizersDescription: See the CVG documentation for the format of the synthesizers list

bargeIn.useDefaultToggleDescription: Do you want to change the bargeIn settings for this node?

input.onSpeechDescription: Allows the audio to be interrupted by the speaker
input.onDtmfDescription: Allows the audio to be interrupted by pressing keys
input.confidenceDescription: The transcription confidence that must be reached for barge-in
input.phraseListDescription: A list of spoken phrases that trigger barge-in
input.phraseListFromContextDescription: A context key that supplies a list of phrases

speak.nodeSummary: Speak something out to the caller with SSML Support
speak.changeSynthesizersSwitchDescription: Do you want to change the synthesizers settings for this node?

speechToText.nodeSummary: Speech-to-Text services need to be used to transcribe the expected input in the the best possible way
speechToText.inputProfileTokenDescription: Please use the profile token as displayed in VIER CVG, Speech Service Profiles
speechToText.inputTranscriberDescription: Type in one of the follow Speech-to-Text Services: 'GOOGLE', 'IBM', 'MICROSOFT' or leave empty to set a service via profile token
speechToText.inputBoostedPhrasesDescription: Enter the list of phrases that receive an increased weight during voice recognition.
speechToText.inputBoostedPhrasesFromContextDescriptio: Enter the key for which a list of phrases to be boosted is stored in the Context. If this node contains a list of boosted phrases, then it will be merged with the list from the Context.

outboundService.nodeSummary: Check the Result of the Outbound Call

referService.nodeSummary: Check the result of the call refer

timer.enableTimerDescription: Check this option to enable the inactivity timer, uncheck it to disable the timer.

aggregateInput.timeoutFieldLabel: Sets the Input Aggregation Timeout in (s)
aggregateInput.timeoutFieldDescription: This option configures the time in seconds after the last utterance, after which the input is considered complete and is delivered to the bot.
aggregateInput.enableFieldLabel: Enable or disable the input aggregation
aggregateInput.enableFieldDescription: Check this option to enable the input aggregation, uncheck it to disable the input aggregation.
